title: Full Show (Draymond Green altercation with Jordan Poole, Lakers lose to Suns in Preseason, Does Von Miller know where OBJ is going?)
description:
00:00 LeBron drops 23 in Lakers preseason loss to Suns
23:09 Draymond Green reportedly facing internal disciplinary action for altercation with Jordan Poole
55:08 LeBron says he wants to eventually own an NBA team in Las Vegas
1:06:04 Von Miller says he talks to OBJ every week and already knows where he is going
1:19:10 Westbrook scores 12 points in Lakers preseason loss
1:31:43 Jerry Jones says Micah Parsons should be in the discussion with Aaron Donald
1:43:04 Warriors reviewing altercation between Draymond Green and Jordan Poole
1:49:47 Rams protester who ran on the field files police report against Bobby Wagner for hitting him
1:53:32 Blake Bortles announces retirement from NFL
